channel.title: projects on Macamev
channel.description: Recent content in projects on Macamev

item.title: Project: Frog Can Jump
item.description: FrogCanJump is a 2D doodle jump inspired platformer arcade game. It’s not yet finished and is currently still in development. I’m continuing work on the game as I still see a lot of potential features and juice that can be added. So far the very basics are implemented that makes this in to a game. The player can jump and score is kept, best highscore is stored to add an extra challenge of beting ones own score.

item.title: Project: Pajatso
item.description: This project is a 2D game created with the Godot game engine. The game is a remake of the old classic pajatso gambling game. The player’s goal is to shoot coins in to boxes to score. You can adjust the strength of the shot by following the bar progress. You’re able to get more coins by when the timer is done counting down. Once the timer is done press the get more coins button.
